subject: Re: images
preview: Hi David, Hi Ed, Confirming the most recent round of updates have been completed. Can we please ask that you review the changes and perform a site-wide check we prepare for launch. Once reviewed, plea

full_threads.body:
Hi David, Hi Ed,

Confirming the most recent round of updates have been completed.

Can we please ask that you review the changes and perform a site-wide check we prepare for launch.

Once reviewed, please let us know and we'll tackle the final steps.

Hi @chris done updating service management image

Time: +5mins @ricaV2
@jaime sorry, one more.

Sorry this one. Not last

Thanks, have a good Friday!

Hi @chris , updates completed, please check thanks

https://www.bluewatercontrol.com/

✅ Reupload all the images as most of them there have been some minor updates.
✅ Can we change the "Billing" section in Mobility Services to "Cost Allocation".
✅ Please keep in mind that the images are large so they will need to be shrunk to increase loading speed.

Done updating all images in this following pages
✅ https://bluewatercontrol.wolfiq.cloud/telecom-expense-management/
✅ https://bluewatercontrol.wolfiq.cloud/mobility-lifecycle/

Done accordion updates
✅ https://bluewatercontrol.wolfiq.cloud/legal/

Time: +25mins @ricaV2

Hi David, Hi Edward, 

Thanks, confirming the images have been received and we are working through the updates. This indeed includes optimising the images for quick website load times.

Thanks Chris. I didn't realise they were in the one page. Yes, we will need a list or drop down for archived ones. Thanks

Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Hey Chris, Hope you are well. Please find the updated images attached to this email. I have named the screenshots as per section name. Please could we do the following:
  • Reupload all the images as most of them there have been some minor updates.
  • Can we change the "Billing" section in Mobility Services to "Cost Allocation".
  • Please keep in mind that the images are large so they will need to be shrunk to increase loading speed.
Please feel free to reach out if there are any remaining questions. Regards, Edward Cameron | Principal Product Designer edward.cameron@bluewatercontrol.com WeWork Level 1, 1 Sussex Street, Barangaroo NSW 2000 Australia. bluewatercontrol.com To explore the benefits of Bluewater, click HERE THINK BEFORE YOU INK: Please consider the environment before printing a hard copy of this email or any of its attachments. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately via the contact details provided
Noted @chris  thanks
@jaime are you able to assist in Glen's absence?

Hi David, 

Great, we'll keep an eye out for Ed's email. 

At present the terms are loaded as they appear on: https://bluewatercontrol.wolfiq.cloud/legal/

I have asked the dev team to revise the previous versions into a dropdown and will loop back once complete.

HI Guys,

Ed is sending a note today to finalise images. How are we planning to address previous Terms of Use?

Thanks

Dave

Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Resolved. Thanks Chris

Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Hi David, 

We found the culprit, can you please check to confirm it is resolved at your end?

Yes, that was it. Cleared cache and still showing. Am I the only one getting this?

Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Yes, that was it. Cleared cache and still showing. Am I the only one getting this?

Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Hi David, 

No sweat. I presume you are referring to the "L SEP" box that appears before the text "I love"? 

Can you please clear your cache and check to see if it renders displays correctly at your end?

Sorry for delay Chris, I have been away. Please see widget below



Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Sorry for delay Chris, I have been away. Please see widget below

Thanks again for your patience.

Confirming the requested screenshots have been updated. You can review them here:
